cantCloseMediaWindowOpen: Mialà amin'ny "Fampisehoana efijery" alohan'ny hialana amin'ny M³.
disableAutoUpdate: Hajanona ny fanavaozana mandeha ho azy
disableHardwareAcceleration: Tsy ampiasa "accélération matérielle" (Fanamarihana : Aza alefa ito raha tsy hitanao hoe misy olana amin'ny fampisehoana efijery. Raha ovainao ity dia mila averina sokafana ito M³ ito.)
dontForgetToGetMedia: Aza adino ny manavao ny Sary/Video mba ahafahanao mandefa azy mandritran'ny fivoriana
enableMediaDisplayButton: Hampiseo ny Sary/Video amin'ny efijery na "fenêtre" manokana
enableMusicButton: Andefa ny bokotra ahafahana mandefa hira mifangaro
enableObs: Handefa ny fifandraisana amin'ny OBS Studio (mila obs-websocket)
enablePp: Handefa ny hitsin-dalana (raccourcis) mandritran'ny fampisehoana Sary/Video (azo ampiasaina amin'ny fibaikona USB ohatra)
errorAdditionalMedia: Misy olana eo fampidirana ny Sary/Video. Miresaha amin'ny mpiandraikitrin'ny "video conférence"
errorAdditionalMediaList: Misy olana amin'ny fampisehoana ny listrin'ny Sary/Video. Avereno indray azafady na miresaha amin'ny mpiandraikitrin'ny "video conférence"
errorBadOutputPath: Misy tarehimarika tsy mety ny soratra nampidirinao. Azafady, ataovy azo antoka hoe tsy misy an'ireto ny soratra:
errorExtractFromJWPUB: Nisy olana teo amin'ny fakàna ny Sary/Video amin'ity JWPUB ity:
errorForcedSettingsEnforce: Nisy olana amin'ny firafitry ny fiangonana. Azafady, resaho ireo rahalahy miandraikitra ny video conference.
errorGetCongMedia: Nisy olana nitranga teo am-pakàna ny Sary/Video'ny fiangonana. Azafady, hamarino ny firafitry ny fandrindrana ny fiangonanao na mifandraisa amin'ny mpikarakara ny video conference.
errorGetMwMedia: An error occurred while fetching media for the midweek meeting. Please try again later or contact your videoconference organizer.
errorGetWeMedia: An error occurred while fetching media for the weekend meeting. Please try again later or contact your videoconference organizer.
errorInvalidPrefs: An error occurred while loading your saved preferences. Please reconfigure all settings as needed before proceeding.
errorJwpubDbFetch: An error occurred while attempting to fetch the following publication:
errorJwpubMediaExtract: An error occurred while extracting media from the following publication:
errorMwbUnavailable: The Meeting Workbook is not available in your selected language. Consider setting a fallback language to use whenever necessary.
errorNoShuffleSongs: There were no songs found to shuffle. Please try again later or contact your videoconference organizer.
errorObs: An error occurred while attempting to connect to OBS Studio. Please verify that OBS Studio is running and that the obs-websocket configuration is correct.
errorObsAuth: The password for the OBS Studio integration might be incorrect. Please verify that the password is correct and try again.
errorObsCameraScene: The configured default camera scene does not exist anymore. Please change it in the settings.
errorObsMediaScene: The configured media scene does not exist anymore. Please change it in the settings.
errorOffline: The application is offline. Data can't be downloaded or uploaded!
errorPpEnable: The keyboard shortcuts during media playback could not be enabled. Please check if your settings are valid.
errorRename: Nisy olana teo am-panovàna ny anaran'ireto:
errorSetVars: An error occurred while attempting to create or access a directory. Please make sure that you have access to the following path on your computer.
errorSiteCheck: Unable to establish a connection to the following site:
errorSyncCongMedia: An error occurred while fetching media from congregation sync. Please try again later or contact your videoconference organizer.
errorWebdavLocked: Could not modify the following cong server file because it was locked. Try unlocking it or modify the file manually.
errorWebdavLs: An error occurred while attempting to read the following directory. Please contact your videoconference organizer.
errorWebdavNotSupported: The service you are using for your congregation server is currently not supported. It might not work as intended.
errorWebdavPut: An error occurred while attempting to write the following file. Please contact your videoconference organizer.
errorWebdavRm: An error occurred while attempting to delete the following file. Please contact your videoconference organizer.
errorWebdavTooBig: Lehibe laotra ny zavatra nalefanao (tsy tokony hiaotran'ny 512MB). Tafiditra ato ilay izy, fa tsy lasa any amin'ny serveur'ny fiangonana.
errorWebdavTooManyRequests: Be laotra ny hafatra alefa any amin'ny serveur. Mamerena rehefa kelikely azafady.
errorWUnavailable: The Study Edition of the Watchtower is not available in your selected language. Consider setting a fallback language to use whenever necessary.
excludeLffImages: Exclude images from the lff book outside the Congregation Bible Study
excludeTh: Exclude all media from the th brochure
fieldInvalid: This is not a valid value for this field.
fieldShortcutInvalid: This is not a valid shortcut
hideMediaLogo: Hide logo from media presentation window
hideWinAfterMedia: Hide media window after media finished playing
infoPubIgnored: Unable to fetch media for the following publication:
infoShortcutSetFail: M³ was unable to activate the following keyboard shortcut. If you wish to use this keyboard shortcut, please make sure that no other app is using it, and relaunch M³. Otherwise, no action is required.
keepOriginalsAfterConversion: Tsy esorina ireo Sary/Video tena izy ahorinan'ny famadihana azy
mediaSaveFolder: Folder in which to save media
mediaWinShortcut: Shortcut to toggle media window visibility
mediaWindowBackground: Background image for media presentation mode
noMedia: Mbola tsy misy Sary/Video amin'io daty io. Mampidira sary, hira sy video manokana na rakitra avy amin'ny JWPUB.
noMeetings: Mbola tsy misy fivoriana. Andramo avaozina azafady ny Sary/Video azo alaina eo amin'ny pejy fandraisana
notAnImage: Tsy mety ity sary ity. Misafidiana hafa azafady
obsCameraScene: Default stage view scene in OBS Studio
obsMediaScene: Media window scene in OBS Studio
ppBackward: Key combination to play previous media item
ppForward: Key combination to play next media item
presentShortcut: Shortcut to open media presentation mode
runAtStartup: Alefa hoazy ity programa ity rehefa velona ity fitaovana ity
selectExternalMedia: These referenced media files are not included in the JWPUB file. Please click on each one to locate it on your computer:
settingLocked: Some settings have been locked by your congregation's videoconference organizer.
settingsLockedExplain: The settings selected below will be applied, in their current state, to all users who connect to the same folder and server. Please, change these settings only if you are the designated videoconference organizer, or if you have been given permission to do so by a responsible brother.
settingsLockedWhoAreYou: Are you the videoconference organizer designated by the body of elders?
specialCong: Special congregation (without regular meetings, e.g. schools)
updateDownloaded: An update to M³ was downloaded successfully. The installation will begin when M³ is closed.
updateDownloading: An update to M³ is being downloaded in the background.
updateError: Something went wrong while checking for updates.
updateInstalled: Tafiditra ny fanavaozana vaovao an'ny M³.
updateNotDownloaded: An update to M³ is available, but could not be downloaded automatically. Please download it manually.
wannaHelpExisting: The local language configured has no active translator. Would you like to help to translate M³ for users who speak that language?
wannaHelpExplain: The media language currently configured is not yet available as a display language for M³. Would you like to help to translate M³ for users who speak that language?
wannaHelpWillGoAway: This notification will only appear when a new version of M³ is released.
warnFileNotAvailable: The following file is not yet available. Please try again later, or contact your videoconference organizer
warnMp4ConversionFailure: The following file could not be converted to MP4 format:
warnNoDocumentsFound: No media was found in any of the chosen JWPUB's documents. Please validate the file or contact the developer of this app.
warnPdfConversionFailure: The pages from the following PDF file could not be extracted as images:
warnSvgConversionFailure: The following file was not recognized as a valid SVG image:
warnUnknownLastVersion: Unable to establish previously installed version of M³. Assuming app was just updated.
